text: Asano Nagayoshi (1927–2007) was the 30th family head of the Asano clan, which ruled over Hiroshima Domain before 1871. == Early life == Asano's parents were Asano Nagatake and Princess Yamashina no miya Yasuko, daughter of Prince Yamashina Kikumaro. == References == Category:1927 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Asano clan
title: Asano Nagayoshi
